title: BRIEF-Aptiv Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.29 From Continuing Operations Excluding Items
text:
May 2, 2018 / 10:48 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Aptiv Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.29 From Continuing Operations Excluding Items Reuters Staff
May 2 (Reuters) - Aptiv PLC:
* APTIV REPORTS RECORD FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND RAISES FULL YEAR OUTLOOK
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.29 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS EXCLUDING ITEMS
* Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.15 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q1 REVENUE $3.6 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $3.37 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.20 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 NET SALES $3,500 MILLION - $3,600 MILLION
* SEES 2018 NET SALES $13,950 MILLION - $14,350 MILLION
* SEES Q2 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.33 - $1.38
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.30, REVENUE VIEW $3.46 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED NET INCOME PER SHARE $5.20 - $5.40
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $5.20, REVENUE VIEW $13.91 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 CAPEX $750 MILLION
